meanings.definition: The quality of being friendly and cheerful.
meanings.sent1: Her genialities always brightened up the room.
meanings.sent2: The genialities of the host made everyone feel welcome.
meanings.sent3: His genialities were so contagious that even grumpy people couldn't resist smiling.
meanings.sent4: The genialities of the sun warmed up the chilly morning.
meanings.sent5: The genialities of the puppy were evident in its wagging tail and playful demeanor.

meanings.definition: An act or expression of friendliness and warmth.
meanings.sent1: The small gestures of genialities from the new neighbor were heartwarming.
meanings.sent2: She showed her genialities by offering a warm hug to her friend.
meanings.sent3: The cat displayed unexpected genialities by curling up in the lap of a stranger.
meanings.sent4: The genialities of the campfire brought comfort to the weary travelers.
meanings.sent5: His genialities shone through in the kind words he spoke to everyone he met.
